unnormalised: Hey, just saw your post! For insurance, ICICI Pru Life iProtect Smart plan seems good, covers till age 75, and premiums start from Rs. 8,000/yr. Do compare with HDFC Life Click 2 Protect Super too!
normalised: Hey, just saw your post! For insurance, I-C-I-C-I Pru Life iProtect Smart plan seems good, covers till age seventy five, and premiums start from rupees eight thousand per year. Do compare with H-D-F-C Life Click two Protect Super too!
